org.hamcrest

Interface SelfDescribing

  • All Known Subinterfaces:

    All Known Implementing Classes:
    ActionSequence, AllOf, AllParametersMatcher, AnyOf, AssumptionViolatedException, BaseMatcher, BigDecimalCloseTo, Cardinality, ChangeStateSideEffect, CombinableMatcher, CurrentStateMatcher, CustomAction, CustomMatcher, CustomTypeSafeMatcher, DescribedAs, DiagnosingMatcher, DoAllAction, Every, ExpectationError, FeatureMatcher, HasProperty, HasPropertyWithValue, HasToString, HasXPath, InStateOrderingConstraint, Invocation, InvocationDispatcher, InvocationExpectation, Is, IsAnything, IsArray, IsArrayContaining, IsArrayContainingInAnyOrder, IsArrayContainingInOrder, IsArrayWithSize, IsCloseTo, IsCollectionContaining, IsCollectionWithSize, IsCompatibleType, IsEmptyCollection, IsEmptyIterable, IsEmptyString, IsEqual, IsEqualIgnoringCase, IsEqualIgnoringWhiteSpace, IsEventFrom, IsIn, IsInstanceOf, IsIterableContainingInAnyOrder, IsIterableContainingInOrder, IsIterableWithSize, IsMapContaining, IsNot, IsNull, IsSame, JUnit4Mockery, JUnitRuleMockery, MethodMatcher, MethodNameMatcher, Mockery, MockObjectMatcher, OrderingComparison, ParametersMatcher, ReturnDefaultValueAction, ReturnEnumerationAction, ReturnIteratorAction, ReturnValueAction, SamePropertyValuesAs, SamePropertyValuesAs.PropertyMatcher, SelfDescribingValue, StacktracePrintingMatcher, StateMachine, StringContains, StringContainsInOrder, StringEndsWith, StringStartsWith, SubstringMatcher, ThrowableCauseMatcher, ThrowableMessageMatcher, ThrowAction, TypeSafeDiagnosingMatcher, TypeSafeMatcher, TypeSafeMatcher, VoidAction

    public interface SelfDescribing
    The ability of an object to describe itself.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void describeTo(Description description)
      Generates a description of the object.

    • Method Detail

      • describeTo

        void describeTo(Description description)
        Generates a description of the object. The description may be part of a a description of a larger object of which this is just a component, so it should be worded appropriately.
        Parameters:
        description - The description to be built or appended to.
